definition: "Sache" refers to a tangible or intangible entity, concept, or matter that holds significance or relevance in a particular context. It is commonly used to describe a concrete object, an abstract idea, or a specific situation. This term is frequently employed to discuss various topics, address issues, or refer to things of importance in everyday conversations, legal matters, or professional settings.

examples.german: Er hat seine Sache gut gemacht.
Ich habe noch ein paar Sachen zu erledigen.
examples.english: I still have a few things to do.
